member.param: The HTTP form body to parse.
member.returns: The object containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.summary: Append the given query key and value to the URI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders
member.summary: Contains utility APIs to assist with common encoding and decoding operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String)
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws FormatException if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded substring of a given string.
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws FormatException if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes an input using base64url encoding.
member.returns: The base64url-encoded form of the input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes an input using base64url encoding.
member.param: The offset into at which to begin encoding.
The number of bytes of to encode.
member.returns: The base64url-encoded form of the input.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.Keys
member.summary: Gets a collection containing the keys.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Get the associated value from the collection. Multiple values will be merged. Returns null if the key is not present.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.ContainsKey(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the collection contains an element with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get the associated value from the collection. Multiple values will be merged. Returns null if the key is not present.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Collections.ReadableStringCollection.GetValues(System.String)
member.summary: Get the associated values from the collection in their original format. Returns null if the key is not present.
